name: Pizza Time (dopey_kun)
description:
Made for LOWREZJAM 2021

This game was inspired heavily by Great Pizza Good Pizza.

Note:

Purchasing "Marketing" in the shop will increase customer spawn rates.

Controls:

Mouse only. 

Left Click - Interact

Right Click - More info

Credits:

Art, Programming: Me

Music: https://richarrest.itch.io/visual-novel-music-pack-tiny-pack

Sfx: https://kenney.nl/assets/

Other Sfx from Freesound.org: https://freesound.org/people/se2001/sounds/463820/, https://freesound.org/people/avreference/sounds/554422/, https://freesound.org/people/Adrianac/sounds/266439/

Font: https://managore.itch.io/m5x7
